sentence: Monday, Jan 3, 2022 9:30:53 AM Pacific Standard Time Jeff Singer MI-Gov: Conservative radio host Tudor Dixon has earned the backing of Rep. Bill Huizenga ahead of the August Republican primary to face Democratic incumbent Gretchen Whitmer.
title: Daily Kos Elections Live Digest: 1/3

sentence: Conservative media personality Tudor Dixon came in fourth with about 14 percent of respondents recognizing her name.
author: Ashley Oliver
title: Poll: Republicans Face Uphill Battle to Unseat Michigan Democrat Gov. Gretchen Whitmer

sentence: Both businessman Kevin Rinke and chiropractor Garrett Soldano each trail Whitmer by seven points, while conservative media personality Tudor Dixon is ten points behind Whitmer.
author: Ashley Oliver
title: Poll: Democrat Gretchen Whitmer Tied with Former Detroit Police Chief James Craig in Michigan Governor's Race

sentence: Other Republican candidates for Michigan governor are Oakland County businessman Kevin Rinke; Norton Shores businesswoman and conservative commentator Tudor Dixon; Kalamazoo chiropractor Garrett Soldano; Michigan State Police Capt.
author: Paul Egan
title: 'Quality guru' Perry Johnson joins crowded Republican race for Michigan governor

sentence: The poll also found that Kevin Rinke holds five percent of the vote, Tudor Dixon and Ryan Kelly have four percent, and Perry Johnson and Mike Brown hold three percent.
author: Jacob Bliss
title: Poll: Former Detroit Police Chief James Craig Holds Wide Lead over Republican Rivals

author: Paul Egan
title: Michigan's primary ballot may be 'disaster' for GOP candidates for governor, expert says

sentence: Conservative radio host Tudor Dixon doesn't have the same resources as her intra-party foes, but she sports endorsements from Reps. Bill Huizenga and Lisa McClain.
title: Daily Kos Elections Live Digest: 4/22

sentence: The challenges against former Detroit Police Chief James Craig, conservative commentator Tudor Dixon and Oakland County businessman Perry Johnson could threaten their candidacies if successful.
author: Clara Hendrickson
title: Michigan GOP candidates hoping to unseat Whitmer face challenges to nominating petitions

sentence: In a trio of complaints filed this week, attorneys working with the state Democratic Party said they found problems with the nominating petitions filed by former Detroit police chief James Craig, businessman Perry Johnson and conservative commentator Tudor Dixon enough to disqualify all three from the Aug. 2 primary, they argue.
title: Michigan Democrats accuse GOP candidates of using forged signatures to get on ballot

sentence: Craig is the current frontrunner in the Republican primary, but the primary field is packed with other candidates, including chiropractor Garrett Soldano, businessman Perry Johnson, real estate broker and activist Ryan Kelley, conservative commentator Tudor Dixon, and former car dealership owner Kevin Rinke.
author: Ashley Oliver
title: Poll: Michigan Democrat Gretchen Whitmer Trails Republican on Generic Ballot for Governor's Race

sentence: Craig's campaign faces two challenges one from a Michigan resident represented by lawyer and former Michigan Democratic Party Chair Mark Brewer and another from Michigan Strong PAC, a conservative group supporting GOP gubernatorial candidate Tudor Dixon's campaign.
author: Paul Egan
title: James Craig acknowledges possible fraud in signature gathering for his petition
